channel.title: Downloaded, but how do I play?
channel.description: I downloaded MoparScape, and I get IP's and ports and play like that. IT usually says "error connecting to server". But what's the point in downloadling like BlackScape, Only The Best v2.5...and stuff like that?

item.title: Downloaded, but how do I play?
item.dc:creator: @e0n e0n™
item.description:
@e0n wrote:

the reason your getting error conecting to server could be caused by multiple things, for instance bad internet connection. I think your a little confused, when someone says: “Download my server!”, it means like download their source, which you would do if you were starting a server.

Read full topic
item.source: Downloaded, but how do I play?
